SELECT itm.* FROM rfid_item itm WHERE 1=1
ORDER BY itm.item_level, itm.sort_num asc
SELECT count(*) FROM rfid_item itm WHERE 1=1

SELECT T1.item_seq AS item_seq01 , T2.item_seq AS item_seq02 , T3.item_seq AS item_seq03 , T4.item_seq AS item_seq04 , T5.item_seq AS item_seq05 , T6.item_seq AS item_seq06 , T7.item_seq AS item_seq07 , T8.item_seq AS item_seq08 FROM rfid_item T1 LEFT OUTER JOIN rfid_item T2 ON T1.parent_item_seq = T2.item_seq LEFT OUTER JOIN rfid_item T3 ON T2.parent_item_seq = T3.item_seq LEFT OUTER JOIN rfid_item T4 ON T3.parent_item_seq = T4.item_seq LEFT OUTER JOIN rfid_item T5 ON T4.parent_item_seq = T5.item_seq LEFT OUTER JOIN rfid_item T6 ON T5.parent_item_seq = T6.item_seq LEFT OUTER JOIN rfid_item T7 ON T6.parent_item_seq = T7.item_seq LEFT OUTER JOIN rfid_item T8 ON T7.parent_item_seq = T8.item_seq WHERE T1.use_yn = 'Y'
AND ( T1.item_cd LIKE concat('%', #{searchKeyword} ,'%') OR T1.item_name LIKE concat('%', #{searchKeyword} ,'%') OR T1.remark LIKE concat('%', #{searchKeyword} ,'%') )
AND 1 = 2

SELECT itm.* ,T2.item_name as parent_item_name ,FN_GET_CMMNCODENAME('COM007', itm.asset_type_cd) AS asset_type_name ,FN_GET_CMMNCODENAME('COM002', itm.use_yn) AS use_yn_str FROM rfid_item itm LEFT OUTER JOIN rfid_item T2 ON itm.parent_item_seq = T2.item_seq WHERE itm.ITEM_SEQ = #{itemSeq}
